plot(actual, type = "o", col = "blue", pch = 16, lwd = 2, ylim = range(c(actual, Forecasted)), ylab = "Values", xlab = "Index", main = "Actual vs Forecasted Values<) lines(forecasted, type = "o", col = "red", pch = 16, lwd = 2)
# è®¡ç®—æ®‹å·®ï¼ˆå®é™…å€¼ä¸é¢„æµ‹å€¼ä¹‹é—´çš„å·®å¼‚ï¼‰ residuals <- actual - Forecasted
# å®šä¹‰é˜ˆå€¼ï¼š # é€‰é¡¹ 1ï¼šï¼ˆä¾‹å¦‚ï¼Œ2 ä¸ªæ ‡å‡†å·®ï¼‰ dynamic_threshold <- 2 * sd(residuals) dynamic_outliers <- abs(residuals) > dynamic_threshold
# é€‰é¡¹ 2ï¼šï¼ˆä¾‹å¦‚ï¼ŒåŸºäºå®é™…æ•°æ®çš„å¹³å‡å€¼å’Œæ ‡å‡†å·®çš„ 2 ä¸ªæ ‡å‡†å·®ï¼‰ upper_threshold <- mean(actual)+2 * sd(actual) lower_threshold <- mean(actual)-2 * sd(actual)
outliers_forecasted <- (forecasted > upper_threshold) | (forecasted < lower_threshold)

item.title: Wilcoxon åŒ¹é…å¯¹ç¬¦å·ç§©å’Œç›¸å…³æ€§ï¼ˆPearsonã€Spearman æˆ– Kendallï¼‰
item.description:
æ ¹æ®å‡ºç‰ˆç‰©ã€Šæå–é‡å¤æµ‹é‡è®¾è®¡çš„å…ƒåˆ†æå‰åç›¸å…³æ€§ã€‹https://matthewbjane.quarto.pub/pre-post-correlations/ï¼Œå¦‚æœé…å¯¹ t æ£€éªŒçš„ t ç»Ÿè®¡é‡å€¼å¯ç”¨ï¼Œåˆ™å¯ä»¥è®¡ç®—ç›¸å…³æ ·æœ¬ä¸­å‰åå¾—åˆ†ä¹‹é—´çš„ Pearson ç›¸å…³æ€§ã€‚ pre_mean <- 12.62 pre_sd <- 3.845 post_mean <- 18.33 post_sd <- 5.155 paired_t <- 10.52 n <- 78
r <- (paired_t^2*(sd_pre^2 + sd_post^2)-n*(post_mean-pre_mean)^2) / (2*paired_t^2*sd_pre*sd_post)
r

# ä» p å€¼è·å–é…å¯¹ t paired_t <- qt(pval/2, n-1, lower.tail = FALSE)
r <- (paired_t^2*(sd_pre^2 + sd_post^2)-n*(post_mean-pre_mean)^2) / (2*paired_t^2*sd_pre*sd_post)
